videos.author: LegenVD
videos.title: This dragon commands a zombie army.
videos.description:
Magic: The Gathering Arena deck tech & gameplay with a Sultai landfall deck, ft. Teval, the Balanced Scale as commander in Brawl.

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/LegenVD

00:00 - Intro
01:50 - Deck Tech
07:50 - vs Zurgo, Thunder's Decree
12:58 - vs Ugin, Eye of the Storms
17:08 - vs Helga, Skittish Seer
23:15 - vs Extus, Oriq Overlord
32:30 - vs Eshki, Temur's Roar
40:05 - vs Clement, the Worrywort
48:57 - vs Adeline, Resplendent Cathar
51:46 - vs Nethroi, Apex of Death
53:53 - vs Lonis, Cryptozoologist
